Delegate FSM_API.Error.InternalApiErrorEventHandler

Represents a delegate for internal API error events.

Assembly: FSM_API.dll
Syntax
public delegate void FSM_API.Error.InternalApiErrorEventHandler(string message, Exception exception)
Parameters
Type Name Description

A descriptive error message.
